general_advisory: Keep rainwater in the main rice field by bunding for timely puddling and transplanting, cover the vegetable nursery with polythene, make provisions for drainage, wrapping and propping for sugarcane, apply proper fertilizer and pest management practices for various crops.

advisory: Make provisions for drainage where pulses have been sown
In early planted maize, apply nitrogen fertilizer after receding of rain
Cover the vegetable nursery with polythene to protect from heavy rain
Manage mosaic disease transmitted by whitefly
Apply pre-emergence herbicide when soil is moist
Treat seeds with recommended species of Rhizobium bacterial culture
Treat seeds with Carbendazim or Carboxin + Thiram WP
Now the weather is optimum for planting of papaya
Use high yielding varieties for papaya planting
July and August are optimal for mango planting
Use healthy unbranched grafted seedlings for planting
